= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Hand - flexor profundus digitorum (flexor-profundus-digitorum-muscle)*: flexor of the wrist (midcarpal), metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal joints; flexes the 2-5 digits
  * *Hand - flexor longus pollicis (flexor-longus-pollicis-muscle)*: flexor of the phalanges of the thumb
  * *Hand - flexor sublimis digitorum (flexor-sublimis-digitorum-muscle)*: flexion of the middle phalanges of the fingers at the proximal interphalangeal joints
  * *Palmaris longus (palmaris-longus-muscle)*: weak flexor
  * *Hand - infraspinatus muscle (infraspinatus-muscle)*: lateral rotation of arm; adduction of arm and stabilizes humerus
  * *Hand - supraspinatus muscle (supraspinatus-muscle)*: abduction of arm and stabilizes humerus
  * *Hand - subscapularis muscle (shoulder-subscapularis-muscle)*: rotates medially humerus; stabilizes shoulder
  * *Hand - teres major muscle (shoulder-teres-major-muscle)*: internal rotation of the humerus
  * *Hand - latissimus dorsi muscle (shoulder-latissimus-dorsi-muscle)*: pulls the forelimb dorsally and caudally
  * *Hand - hand somatic receptors (hand-somatic-receptors)*: somatic sensations
  * *Hand - deltoid muscle, anterior (anterior-deltoid-muscle)*: shoulder flexion
  * *Hand - deltoid muscle, lateral and posterior (posteriolateral-deltoid-muscle)*: shoulder abduction, extension
  * *Hand - teres minor muscle (teres-minor-muscle)*: laterally rotates and adducts the arm
  * *Hand - triceps brachii muscle (triceps-brachii-muscle)*: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder
  * *Hand - articularis cubiti muscle (articularis-cubiti-muscle)*: lifts capsule away from joint
  * *Hand - abductor pollicis longus muscle (abductor-pollicis-longus-muscle)*: abduction, extension of thumb
  * *Hand - extensor carpi ulnaris muscle (extensor-carpi-ulnaris-muscle)*: extends the little finger at all joints
  * *Hand - extensor digiti minimi muscle (extensor-digiti-minimi-muscle)*: extends and adducts the wrist
  * *Hand - extensor digitorum muscle (extensor-digitorum-muscle)*: extension of hand and fingers
  * *Hand - extensor indicis muscle (extensor-indicis-muscle)*: extends index finger, wrist
  * *Hand - extensor pollicis brevis muscle (extensor-pollicis-brevis-muscle)*: extension of thumb at metacarpophalangeal joint
  * *Hand - extensor pollicis longus muscle (extensor-pollicis-longus-muscle)*: extension of the thumb (metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal)
  * *Hand - supinator muscle (supinator-muscle)*: supinates forearm
  * *Hand - extensor carpi radialis brevis muscle (extensor-carpi-radialis-brevis-muscle)*: extensor at the wrist joint, abducts the hand at the wrist
  * *Hand - anconeus muscle (anconeus-muscle)*: partly blended in with the triceps, which it assists in extension of the forearm; stabilises the elbow and abducts the ulna during pronation
  * *Hand - brachioradialis muscle (brachioradialis-muscle)*: stabilizer of elbow joint
  * *Hand - extensor carpi radialis longus muscle (extensor-carpi-radialis-longus-muscle)*: extensor and abductor of the hand at the wrist joint
  * *Hand - biceps muscle (biceps-muscle)*: flexes elbow and supinates forearm
  * *Hand - brachialis muscle (brachialis-muscle)*: flexion at elbow joint
  * *Hand - coracobrachialis muscle (coracobrachialis-muscle)*: flexes and adducts humerus
